description: Cody Cummings has a rock hard body, there's no doubt about that. But how does he do it?  Well that's a secret that the camera hasn't caught. All of this is pretty standard for Cody, even when he starts to pull down his shorts and go at his cock, working it into maximum stiffness for your pleasure.Enjoy!
title: Caged Cody
